item.title: Making a Blog
item.description:
Hello, sammy here. A blog!
I decided to make a blog so I can put some of my random thoughts or do a write up on something. Why? Why not?

It’ll probably be boring and kinda inactive but whatever.

If you couldn’t notice, it’s made with Hugo since I thought that would be the easiest to setup. I previously had my thoughts up over here on tilde.town but this is easier to theme in my opinion.

So, welcome to my dumb blog!! Hope you enjoy my ramblings on things I don’t know about and rants.
